abstract: Supplies an `ObservableObject` to a view subhierarchy.

declaration.code: nonisolated func environmentObject<T>(_ object: T) -> some Scene where T : ObservableObject

overview:
## Discussion

The object can be read by any child by using `EnvironmentObject`:

You then read the object inside `ContentView` or one of its descendants using the [doc://com.apple.SwiftUI/documentation/SwiftUI/EnvironmentObject] property wrapper:

items.description: Supplies an observable object to a view’s hierarchy.
items.name: environmentObject(_:)

items.description: A property wrapper type for an observable object that a parent or ancestor view supplies.
items.name: EnvironmentObject

sections.title: Distributing model data throughout your app

title: environmentObject(_:)
